name: CLM_PX
description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record. The CLM_PX table holds the ICD procedures that document surgical procedures on inpatient claims.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CLM_PX_QUAL
columns.description: The qualifier identifying the code set for the International Classification of Diseases (ICD) procedures.

columns.name: CLM_PX
columns.description: The International Classification of Diseases (ICD) procedures for the claim. The principal procedure is stored on the first line and the other procedures are on subsequent lines.

columns.name: CLM_PX_DT
columns.description: The date of the International Classification of Diseases (ICD) procedure.

columns.name: CLM_PX_DESC
columns.description: The text description for an International Classification of Diseases (ICD) procedure.

columns.name: CLM_PX_RANK
columns.description: The rank of this International Classification of Diseases (ICD) procedure compared to the other ICD procedures on the claim.
